author: jstrachan
msg: Updated the overview a little more showing an example action in source code and in use in a Jelly script.

author: jstrachan
msg: Made a few changes to the overview document. Still needs a bit more work to explain what Jelly is

author: jstrachan
msg: Added JavaScript, JPython and PNuts core tag libraries. They kinda work, at least the PNuts one does, though more investigation is required to map BSF beans properly to Jelly scopes. Right now there's a minor hack in there to get it to work. Also for some wierd reason JavaScript (Rhino) doesn't see declared beans.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for BSF and associated scripting languages. Also added a jelly.properties mechanism to allow common tag libraries to have well defined prefixes.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added overview of Jelly and updated the proposal
